mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ARTIST_FOLLOWS WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND ARTIST_ID = #{artistId}
mapper.select: SELECT a.artist_id, a.artist_name, a.profile_image, COUNT(f.follow_id) AS weekly_follower_count FROM ECHO.ARTIST a JOIN ECHO.ARTIST_FOLLOWS f ON a.artist_id = f.artist_id WHERE f.follow_date >= SYSDATE - 7 GROUP BY a.artist_id, a.artist_name, a.profile_image ORDER BY weekly_follower_count DESC;
